description: Protect your precious iPad Mini screen with the VectorGuard from Infinite Products. High quality, ultra clear, VectorGuards will protect your iPad Mini screen from scratches, scrapes, and even the streaks left behind from your fingers. With 2 in the pack, you can share with friends, or keep some for later.
title: Infinite Products VectorGuard Screen Protector Film for iPad mini - 2 Pack (IP00697_F)
